    </terms>

      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author" suffix=".">
          <name form="short" />
        </names>
        <date variable="issued" form="numeric" date-parts="year" suffix="." />
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="author" />
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
